Jitter is the random system behavior that prevents perceptible work from running.

SafetyNet Attestation verifies the device with SafetyNet compatibility tests. SafetyNet api is a part of Google Play Services Framework. Some apps use this api to check whether the device has been rooted or tampered.

The user should restore their device to a clean factory ROM.

Craft Rom is a community that maintains devices in various open source Android projects (MoKee OS, Lineage OS, crDroid, and others) and Chidori Kernel.\n\nOur main priority is stability (unfortunately, it is not always possible to achieve the full extent).
Anything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.
